categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Mahish was a male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire during the Cold War who was the Sith Master of Fannatex. He hunted the Jedi Master Fellil on the planet Alderaan, but was killed by Advozse mercenaries who ambushed Mahish in the mountains of Kaamos Territory.
